Task 7 (7 Marks)

Suggested Time for Task 7: 15 minutes

You need to prepare a response to an email.

Click the buttons below to download the files Email Evidence Document and Company Logo.

Save a copy of each file in the Section 2 subfolder you created.

Read the email you need to prepare a response to.

a) Open your email software / application so that you can prepare a response to the email. (1 mark)

b) Address the email to SJames@TheBus.eu. (1 mark)

c) CC the email to ASingh@TheBus.eu. (1 mark)

d) Add the subject Company Logo. (1 mark)

Make sure you follow all the instructions in the email:

d) Add the subject Company Logo. (1 mark)

  • Attach the Company Logo file (1 mark)
  • Answer the question in the email about the advantage of cloud storage (1 mark)
  • Answer the question in the email about how best to share the logo with customers (1 mark)

You do NOT need to send the email. Instead, paste a screenshot of your finished email into your Email Evidence Document and save the file.

Upload your finished Email Evidence Document file by clicking on the Upload button below.
